Reviews.Title: Great Rugged Computer for the Money! :-)
Reviews.Author: D. Berg
Reviews.Content: I purchased a pre-owened CF-29 Toughbook and have been very satisfied.  I use it extensively in a variety of outdoor environments (heat above 100F, rain, snow, dust, humidity), and have been very satisfied with the overal results.  This isn't the fastest computer in the world, but when running my field applications, I typically only have one or two programs up at most.I am running Windows XP Professional, have Office installed, as well as a few specialty programs.  Parts are found everywhere on EBay, and replacing parts is easy if you have a little computer "fix it" know how.  Mine is the touch screen and I was able to successfully find the touch screen driver on Panasonics website.Panasonic customer service isn't the easiest to work with, so there are plenty of other qualified computer techies out there that have excellent Panasonic know how.I give it a 4/5 stars because, though it's a great computer--it's not perfect.  There is only one USB port, would be nice to have two or more, and since there is no internal fan, it gets kind of hot sometimes.  Other than that, I am very happy with the Panasonic CF29 for what I use it for.

Reviews.Title: Zero warranty support from Panasonic.  ZERO.
Reviews.Author: Big Head
Reviews.Content: So, these computers rarely break.  But they do sometimes break.If yours breaks, forget about it.  Just go buy a new one.I don't like worrying about my warranties, so although the computer comes with a well-written standard warranty, i purchasedthe$250.00  Protection Plus Warranty Upgrade (Years 1-3) plus i purchased the $180.00  Toughbook Premier 3 Year Service Upgrade  and i also purchased the $175.00  3-Year On-site ServiceMy computer broke (i dropped it--not from Six feet, but from about the height of my bedside table...)Panasonic made me prove the warranty by sending a copy of my sales reciept before they would even talk to me about service.Then they tried to talk me out of having the on site service, saying it would be faster and easier if i just sent them the computer.The onsite service guy was nice, but had not been trained on how to fix the Toughbooks, so he took it home with him and sent it to Panasonic.That was a week ago.The onsite guy said i should leave my hard drive inside the computer.He called later and said Panasonic would send me a new computer right away.Then he called back and said that they would not cover accidental damage...and i should have bought one more warranty...I pointed out that the warranty covered "non-intential damage"...their representative said that while "non intentional" seems to mean "accidental" it does not mean that "accidental" is covered!The manager at Panasonic promised to look into my case...but never called me back.One of my warranties included 'overnight' service.I was later told that "overnight' means next business night, which, on a Friday, means Monday...but because Monday comes after Sunday, Monday means Tuesday...Anyway, they have my money, and my computer....and this review.

Reviews.Title: Junk from Proton Computers Inc.!
Reviews.Author: Topgun357
Reviews.Content: You asked for a review and I will give you one.  When the "refurbished computer" arrived, it refused to come on. I had to remove the hard drive and reinsert it. Then battery does not hold charge for more than 1 minute! It is still sitting under the desk. I had to buy a CF-74 from another source and it is working flawlessly. I am so angry and disappointed with the computer, that I did not even call the Proton Computers Inc, the company that sold me the computer. The person that checked it should be fired!  I think I call them today, I know it will cost me more to ship it back to them. Amazon is not the culprit here.Harold, Guyana, South America

Reviews.Title: garbage
Reviews.Author: Meyers Bradley
Reviews.Content: worst piece of crap i ever bought. it hasn't worked since i bought it. DO NOT BUY FROM Toughruggedlaptops! the only reason i gave it a star was because i had to.

Reviews.Title: Bad experince with Toughbook
Reviews.Author: Cecil Cotton
Reviews.Content: The Toughbook arrived late, the explanation I got was the delay was due to hurricane Sandy which was on the east coast. The Toughbook was shipped from California which I thought was on the west coast the last time I checked. According to the tracking number it was in FedEx depot for 6 days in Sacremento Ca.I was told it would be shipped in 5-7 bussiness days at the time I purchased it on line. They lost 6 days before it left California.  Now that I have finally received it, I was offered $20.00 off for the trouble but I do not see where they have reduced the price. On a positive note they did add a touch screen that I did not purchase I don't know if that was the cause for the delay, I do like the touch screen it is very handy, so thanks for that.  My biggest complaint is the battery will not charge. I thought although it was a refurbished computer it would at least have a new (chargable) battery. I let it charge for a full day but I could only get about 2 minutes of life once I disconnected it from the power source. This does not work for me in my field, I do not always have access to power.  I think Amazon should review who they deal with, this is a reflection on you. I will always be cautious in the future when dealing with you.

Reviews.Title: disappointing
Reviews.Author: stargurl
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed in the company, touch screen stopped working 3rd day I had it. The company did nothing, they didn't even contact me... it arrived like it had been in a tornado... I paid $600 for this computer and it should work

Reviews.Title: Cf-29
Reviews.Author: Geo W
Reviews.Content: Very good purchase everything worked flawless my only issue was the packing there was none but again it's a toughbook so it should have and was perfectly fine

Reviews.Title: Tougth book ,for tougth job
Reviews.Author: danny a
Reviews.Content: Is perfect for my job,since i am working in the field,very good product,thanks,i have no problems so far.if any of you up there need a tougth lap top ,this is it,price is very good

Reviews.Title: Most workable
Reviews.Author: Dr. Huber "Huberto"
Reviews.Content: I've been waiting for a laptop of this kind for a long time and find, this one meets practically all my expectations. The soft keyboard takes some getting used to, but that's a minor drawback. Screen brightness is excellent and with it's heft, it does stay in place easily. I'd rate the overall performance as ***.

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: jacob
Reviews.Content: I love these toughbooks I have 2 others and I beat the crap out of all of them they never fail I would recommend this to anyone. I have put these books in mudd, sand, water, snow, rain and much more. I even played games on it while taking a bath in the tub. I have droped these things from as high as 6ft. they never break. I dont have to worry about somone spilling somthing on them or kids droping them. its so nice to have security that if you drop this thing it wont break. if you get mad just throw your computer it wont break. LOL (not really). all in all awsome product. 10 out of 10.

Reviews.Title: careful who you buy from!
Reviews.Author: Richard P. Bogue
Reviews.Content: Be careful who you buy this from if it doesn't have at least a 30 day warranty don't buy it. One week after installing all that needed to run it the machine quit. Bad system board.

Reviews.Title: Exceeds expectations!
Reviews.Author: frecklesz91
Reviews.Content: I love my Toughbook!  This computer is TOUGH and FAST.  Boots up quickly, which I like.  5.5 hr battery life.  Obviously the whole "used," "refurbished," and "partial" game is a lottery, but I paid $160 for this puppy and I am so pleased.  Definitely worth a shot!  The keyboard takes a little getting used to, but I have no real problem with it. Great field computer!  Only downside:  the touchscreen doesn't seem to work.  I guess it was refurbed with a non-touch screen.  Not super big deal though.  Very pleased!

Reviews.Title: An old computer can be New Again
Reviews.Author: Benmoshe ""Freedom is the sure possession...
Reviews.Content: It's like driving an old car...An Armored Vehicle, that is! Provided it has been "professionally refurbished" by someone who knows and cares about what he is doing, this is a bargain for the person who needs to take his work with him even if it's on the floor of his SUV while driving off-road in very rough terrain. The CF-29 was built to take punishment and so far, it has lived up to it's reputation. If you can buy a like-new (they're out there) one for under $200.00, I would say that it's a bargain. Make sure that you are getting Windows XP and Microsoft Office 2007 installed at a minimum.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: andrew "PFC Brian"
Reviews.Content: Great computer for what i use it for.  The battery was bad but a replacment was sent right away.  The comp came with a 1gb ram already in it....but it seemed a little rough.  After replacing it with a A-Tech 1GB ram it picked up and havnt had any issues.  Over all computer is great.

Reviews.Title: nice little product
Reviews.Author: Mr dibbs
Reviews.Content: this is a great little laptop in a nice package  its a little slower but the ruggedability makes up for it, nnd it was at a great price  perfect for my needs

Reviews.Title: Oldie but a Goodie
Reviews.Author: Daotien
Reviews.Content: This (almost vintage) Toughbook still packs a punch. The only drawback is that there is no CD-ROM in it. Otherwise, I like it

Reviews.Title: Glad to have a laptop again
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is my second re-furbished toughbook, I had my first one for about 5yrs on the road as a truck driver, alot of vibration and pounding, looking forward to having this one last at least as long, note, I was surprised to find it dod not come with a ROM-drive or Windows software, I just took the ROM-drive out of my old one, no problem(I am NOT a computer tech).my last one survived a StarBucks coffee being spilled into the keyboard and being rinsed out with about a half gallon of water.  I love my ToughBook!!!

Reviews.Title: Just what we needed
Reviews.Author: Brian D. Schieber
Reviews.Content: Got this to take it to Antarctica. We have a old one of the same model and this one was just as good. I literally dropped the old one off a 4 ft table and no damage.

Reviews.Title: Still not as good as I thought they would be but it may get better.
Reviews.Author: Brian Stengel
Reviews.Content: I bought five each. Having problems with several of the batteries going dead in 20 to 30 mins plus one bad hard drive.

Reviews.Title: All you want and more.
Reviews.Author: Arny Oldiron
Reviews.Content: Very good condition, beautiful in fact all the toys work quiet operation have not got a single bad thing to say about it, battery is strong its all very clean and works 100% very good deal on this laptop - i put aside my cf-28 for now and ejoying the extra power and ram of this sweet clean toughbook.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: sheepherder
Reviews.Content: was best deal out there, as far as Ram, and DVD RW. go, it had a broken up arrow key (Fell off) but this is a used unit, still great deal, the owner was nice when I told him about the key he offered and made it up to me, I didnt ask as I say its used, I would tell anyone to do business with the company and being a forest patrolman my other computers didnt last long including my CF- T8 semi toughbook, we will give this one the test, its very heavy and could be used for self defense if needed.

Reviews.Title: Just Great
Reviews.Author: Joselito Araneta
Reviews.Content: It's great! Just the way I expected. This Toughbook already passed a 1-meter drop test - accidentally! Still working perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Toughbook cf-29
Reviews.Author: John Gupton
Reviews.Content: This product is excellet for those who need the utility of a computer and the durability of a bomb shelter.  It can take a licking and keep on kicking.  The hardware composition is very underpowered in accordance to todays computing standards but it handles a work load very well.  Not good for someone looking for strong graphics performance but excellent for the day to day working may, contractor, tech oriented farmer, or emergency response personell.  I have recommended this pc to many people and at this quality and this price I shall continue.

Reviews.Title: Toughbook
Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: Computer arrived on time and packaged well.  So far everything has been working well. It is a little difficult to type on but you get used to it.  Have used it at the corrals three times and does not seem to be bothered by dust, etc. Happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Someone
Reviews.Content: I bought a refurbished CF-29.  It worked about 2 years with no major problems.  The W key fell off, which just slows down typing a little.  Finally it had power issues and is dead.  It's darn slow compared to "modern" computers, and the CD drive never worked very well.  It was tough--I used it outside and even in the rain once.UPDATE: I thought it died, turns out it was just a bad power cord.  Back up and runnin' like a champ.  Still slower than new models and way less memory.  Many minor problems (such as the power cord, w key, and a couple plastic parts that fell off) but overall this thing is a work horse.  I'd recommend it if you need tough but have a low budget and you don't have overly demanding computing needs.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful.
Reviews.Author: Odie42
Reviews.Content: I received this while deployed in less than 2 weeks.  Works great for a field laptop.  I will buy others in the future.

Reviews.Title: It is better than I expected.
Reviews.Author: wes
Reviews.Content: It is almost brand new, it is even better than I expected. I have had a chance to use it, it surpasses all expectation I had. I love it. I would buy again from this dealer, it was a little slow coming USPS but it came and was perfect. I am excited about this buy, I would buy again from this retailer and am very please with the deal and price and the shape of the item is show room , what more can I say., I am happy. FIVE STARS
